attributes.action: Unlimited Refills On All Soft Drinks Sold From Mcdonalds
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to state that Mcdonalds should have unlimited refills on all their soft drinks. The USA division already has it and have had it for many years and also Subway has it too. But not the UK division.

So I therefore believe that the Mcdonalds UK division should have unlimited refills on all soft drinks sold under the same conditions that the Subway restaurant division has in both the USA & UK.
